title: Video of Men Flogged for ‘Goat Theft’ Shared as Child-Lifting Case
subtitle: Viral Video Fact Check: Madhya Pradesh Child-Lifting Fake News: A video of a mob thrashing a man, allegedly a child-lifter, has been circulated on WhatsApp. In the wake of multiple false child-lifting rumours,Quint received the video for verification
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of an unruly mob thrashing a man, allegedly a child-lifter, has been circulating on WhatsApp. It shows a shirtless man heckled by the mob, while faint voices in the background can be heard saying “beat him”.

Towards the end of the video, the same crowd thrashes another man.
